resources.name: raw-name
resources.resource:
'@type': type.googleapis.com/envoy.api.v2.Cluster
connectTimeout: 5s
loadAssignment:
  clusterName: localhost:8443
  endpoints:
    - lbEndpoints:
        - endpoint:
            address:
              socketAddress:
                address: 127.0.0.1
                portValue: 8443
name: localhost:8443
type: STATIC
